game.name: Batman™: Arkham Knight - Robin and Batmobile Skins Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 로빈, 배트모빌 스킨 팩을 받아 오리지널 팀 드레이크 복장과 로빈 테마 배트모빌 스킨으로 고담 거리를 질주하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get this Robin and Batmobile skins pack to don the Original Tim Drake Robin costume and speed through Gotham City with the Robin Themed Batmobile Skin.
